description: This file defines a configuration data class for a backend application, loading environment variables for database settings, JWT secret, CORS origins, and server port. It includes helper functions to parse environment variables with defaults.

classes.name: Config
classes.description: Data class encapsulating configuration parameters loaded from environment variables.

methods.name: int _int(env_name: str, default: int)
methods.description: Helper function to convert environment variable strings to integers with default fallback.

methods.name: Config get_config()
methods.description: Function that loads and returns application configuration by reading environment variables.
